item.title: Minor Updates
item.description: i haddn't done that much updates to this site as i did before. main reason being i don't know what to add to this website, but i added some things to endromeda. but, i added some minor updates. such updates are making the posts page organized by month, less ugly article dates, and a viewer for images

item.title: Ubuntu is horrible
item.description: Ubuntu is a Linux Distro that has a terrible theme, so much bloat, and a resource hog to systems. Ubuntu is a fine starter distro but there is much better Linux distros that are ALSO easy to use.

item.title: Windows XP is Overrated
item.description: Windows XP is one of the most ugliest and the most overrated operating system known to man. And people who weren't even born when XP was released says that it's the "best OS" ever.

item.title: Endromeda on old browsers
item.description: My friend wants me to post about this so i'm going to do it :troll:. He made a proxy that loads this website without CSS (and in HTTP).

item.title: Articles are now posts
item.description: The articles section is now renamed to Posts. This allows me to make blog-like posts along side articles on endromeda.

item.title: A First Look at Windows 11
item.description: We're going to take a first look on Microsoft's recently leaked Operating System, Windows 11. Which, I took a test drive on a VM. It sucks, ALOT.

item.title: endromeda BETA
item.description: i have a beta website, where i try out new things and see if they should be on the main website, the beta page is at /beta/.

item.title: DeviantART Sucks
item.description: The DeviantART redesign is one of the worst redesigns i've ever seen, Even worse than YouTube Polymer, it's a buggy, slow, confusing mess of a redesign.

item.title: Article Pages Change
item.description: All existing article pages has been moved and renamed, to be more organized once more articles come.

item.title: Gnome 3 and KDE 4/5 Sucks
item.description: Gnome 3 and KDE Plasma is trash, every setup I see with one of them looks so ugly and blinds my eyes. Gnome and KDE had lost their way on making a actual good Desktop enviornment.

item.title: The OIC is a drama landfill
item.description: The OIC (Old Internet Community) is an kindergarden playground and 5 year old kids fighting around, but it's through harrassment and doxxing. OIC is a hellhole powered by toxicity.

item.title: Windows 10 is a dumpster
item.description: Windows 10 is a absolute dumpster in fire. It's a absolute resource hogger, it's spyware and looks terrible, There is some ways to make Windows 10 a bit more tollerable.

item.title: Why Firefox Proton is SHIT
item.description: Somewhere in Febuary 2021, Firefox has put a new Proton redesign in the nightly builds of Firefox. In this article, i'm going to be ranting on why the Firefox Proton redesign is absolute SHIT.
